articles.content: This weeks AFL fixture has been thrown into chaos, with West Coasts round five clash with Richmond postponed after a second wave of coronavirus cases in Victoria sparked concerns about interstate clu… [+3604 chars]

articles.title: Johnson hangs on to win Travelers as fourth positive hits PGA Tour - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Dustin Johnson's final-round 67 secured his 21st PGA title while the tour recorded its fourth COVID-19 positive with Dylan Frittelli out of the next event.
articles.content: Former world No.1 Johnson narrowly avoided disaster on the 15th at TPC River Highlands, when he was forced to remove his shoes and stand in a pond to hit his ball, which landed in the damp turf next … [+2304 chars]

articles.author: Chris Nice
articles.title: Round 5 shake-up: Saints snare second prime-time slot - St Kilda FC
articles.description: St Kilda’s return to prime-time footy has been fast-tracked, with the club’s Round 5 clash against Carlton rescheduled to Thursday night at Marvel Stadium.
articles.content:
St Kildas return to prime-time footy has been fast-tracked, with the clubs Round 5 clash against Carlton rescheduled to Thursday night at Marvel Stadium.
